T_CONSTRAINT.CONSTRTXT: select validation_message from USER_CONFIG_SETTING us where ( us.data_type = 'BOOLEAN_10' and user_config_setting_validation.boolean_10_val(us.value) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'BOOLEAN_TF' and user_config_setting_validation.boolean_tf_val(us.value) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'BOOLEAN_YN' and user_config_setting_validation.boolean_yn_val(us.value) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'DATE' and user_config_setting_validation.date_val(us.value) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'DATE_F' and user_config_setting_validation.date_f_val(us.value) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'DOUBLE' and user_config_setting_validation.double_val(us.value) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'INTEGER' and user_config_setting_validation.integer_val(us.value) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'REG_EXP' and user_config_setting_validation.regexp_val(us.value, us.reg_exp) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'STRING_MAX' and user_config_setting_validation.stringmax_val(us.value, us.string_length) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'STRING_MIN' and user_config_setting_validation.stringmin_val(us.value, us.string_length) = 0 ) or ( us.data_type = 'TIME' and user_config_setting_validation.time_val(us.value) = 0 )
